name: Safetica Technologies
tag_list: data-loss-prevention, data-protection, activity-blocking, activity-monitoring, disk-encryption, employee, monitoring, productivity, encryption, dlp, protection, business, enterprise
overview: Safetica Technologies is the leader on the market of software protection against data leaks and threats caused by human factor. The company has been developing internal security products since 2004. Safetica Endpoint Security is the flagship of the company – it is the only complete solution on the market capable of preventing financial losses related to data leaks and low productivity. Safetica Technologies has an extensive partner network which facilitates product distribution to more than 40 countries worldwide. Safetica Technologies and its partners share one vision: to make the world a safer place for business.
